situationSummary: Multi-fault chaos scenario affecting 2 nodes. Cross-sector cascade.
proposedAction: Coordinate cross-sector response; isolate fault origins and contain cascade
regulatoryBasis: Complies with Civil Contingencies Act 2004, multi-sector coordination Statutory compliance: 2026 Flood Resilience Act, Section 4.2, Water Quality Protection Standards, WQP-2026-01.

notes: Limited historical evidence for this scenario

actuatorBoundary.notes: No direct OT writes. Human authorization required for all actuator commands. This packet provides permission and coordination framework only.

outcomeSummary: 95% confidence multi-fault cascade contained with cross-sector coordination.

statutoryCompliance.certificateStatement: This action was performed in accordance with Section 4.2 of the 2026 Flood Resilience Act: Maintain service continuity during declared flood emergencies, WQP-2026-01 of the Water Quality Protection Standards: Isolate affected systems to prevent contamination spread. The authorized operator is protected under the statutory framework for emergency response actions during declared unknown incidents.

statutoryBasis.requirement: Maintain service continuity during declared flood emergencies
Isolate affected systems to prevent contamination spread
